Trails.Name: Lost in the Woods (Lower) Uphill Route
Lost in the Woods (Upper) Uphill Route

_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Saturday, December 27, 2025 3:30 PM Mammoth Mountain will reopen tomorrow, Sunday, December 28, with lower mountain lift operations only. Lifts from Canyon and Eagle Lodges are expected to open at 8:30 AM, with terrain expanding toward Main Lodge as conditions allow. Main, Canyon, and Eagle Lodges will be open with all services available. Snowmobile Adventures & Tamarack Cross-Country Ski Center will also open tomorrow. With deep snow on the mountain, please ski and ride with a partner, keep your group in sight, and avoid tree wells. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding following this storm cycle. Please continue to check back for operational updates.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: Give others space on the slopes
